sentences.english: Everybody's hep red-eyed disease is among them one of.
sentences.chinese: 大家熟知的紅眼病就是其中之一。

sentences.english: Experts advise the residents of the city to pay attention to personal hygiene to prevent the disease.
sentences.chinese: 專家提醒市民注意個人衛生，預防紅眼病。

sentences.english: Recently, "pink-eye disease" is spreading in many places across the country.
sentences.chinese: 最近一段時間，全國多地紅眼病發病出現上升勢頭。

sentences.english: The pink eye is going around again this summer .
sentences.chinese: 這個夏天紅眼病再次流行。

sentences.english: What's the meaning of the proverb 'Be green with envy'?
sentences.chinese: “紅眼病”這個諺語是什麼意思？
